mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue( id, fullname, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, createBy, createTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, address ) values( #{id}, #{fullname}, #{appellation}, #{owner}, #{company}, #{job}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{website}, #{mphone}, #{state}, #{source}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{address} )
mapper.select:
select c.id, c.fullname, c.appellation, c.company, c.phone, c.source, u.name as owner, c.mphone, c.state from tbl_clue c join tbl_user u on u.id=c.owner
fullname like '%' #{fullname} '%'
company like '%' #{company} '%'
phone like '%' #{phone} '%'
source like '%' #{source} '%'
owner like '%' #{owner} '%'
mphone like '%' #{mphone} '%'
state like '%' #{state} '%'
order by c.createTime desc limit #{skipCount},#{pageSize}

select c.id, c.fullname, c.appellation, u.name as owner, c.company, c.job, c.email, c.phone, c.website, c.mphone, c.state, c.source, c.createBy, c.createTime, c.description, c.contactSummary, c.nextContactTime, c.address, c.editBy, c.editTime from tbl_clue c join tbl_user u on c.owner=u.id where c.id=#{id}

select a.name,a.startDate,a.endDate,u.name as owner, car.id as id from tbl_activity a join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on a.id = car.activityId join tbl_user u on a.owner = u.id where car.clueId = #{clueId}

select a.id,a.name, a.startDate, a.endDate, u.name as owner from tbl_activity a join tbl_user u on a.owner=u.id where a.name like '%' #{aname} '%' and a.id not in( select activityId from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clueId=#{clueId}
)
